title: 🍁RENOVATED TRADITIONAL HOME, VIEWS 🌄
posting_body: ['CONTACT COREY for MORE INFO, PICS', 'TEXT CODE: SR22059623CN & your name to', 'show contact info', 'Or call or email me', "IF THIS PLACE DOESN'T FIT,", 'ASK ABOUT OUR EXTENSIVE LIST OF', 'OTHER PROPERTIES / RENT / BUY / SELL /', 'LUXURY ESTATES / HOUSES /', 'COMMERCIAL / APARTMENTS', "*and we'll assist you through the entire process!*", '$8,700 House For Rent 1 Year+', '5 Beds', '4 Baths', '4,200 SqFt', 'Traditional facade belies a completely renovated contemporary home with state-of-the-art amenities throughout.', "The open floorplan has a seamless flow from the living and dining area to the chef's kitchen with breakfast bar, granite counters, and viking stainless steel appliances.", "Multiple french doors open to the beautiful backyard brick patio lush with palm trees, fire pit and hot tub/spa that's perfect for entertaining or simply relaxing while overlooking the stunning unobstructed city and tree top view.", 'Four bedrooms, including a junior master, are all downstairs.', 'Upstairs is the spacious master bed with fireplace and en suite bath with separate shower and tub offers the same views right off the balcony that leads to the expansive covered rooftop deck.', 'This home also boasts a media room with projector and screen with wet bar.', '***Please Text Code: SR22059623CN & your name to', 'show contact info', 'For Details & Pictures***', 'And check out my website: <URL>/', 'Brought to you by Corey Trevor at Los Angeles Area - eXp Realty of California, Inc.', 'CA DRE#01878277 Listing Agent Jennifer Santulan Equity Union DRE#: 01811831']
